```{r ld-ree1, eval=gis_update}
path <- "~/Projects/gis/restoration_wedzin_kwa/data_field/2024/form_monitoring_ree_20240923.gpkg"

  path
)


ree1_raw |> 
  readr::write_csv(
    file = "data/inputs_extracted/ree_2024_01.csv",
    na = ""
  )
```
